title: Account Manager
description: Started as Junior Account Manager and quickly advanced to Account Manager.
Responsible for customer contact, quotations, planning, technical deliveries, and project management.
Advised and guided clients in their transition to Azure, including drafting documentation and migration plans.
Led project teams and coordinated the execution of cloud migration projects.
Performed marketing tasks and coordinated collaboration with external agencies.
Carried out operational tasks such as contract management, procurement, and evaluation meetings.

title: IT Consultant
description: Built websites for local entrepreneurs, hosted on a self-built cloud platform.
Hired as a freelancer by local IT parties.

title: Intern DevOps Engineer
description: Managed and updated mission-critical platform in Google Cloud for Europe and America.
Used Terraform, Ansible, Packer, Nginx, and Linux.
Scaled platform during holidays, monitoring and uptime management.
Migrated VM applications to Docker containers.
Resolved bugs, researched PHP security bug, tested Cloud Load Balancer.
